scripts.template: mustache src/constants/_generated/$VARIANT.js subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache src/constants/_generated/$VARIANT.js src/constants/env.mustache > src/constants/env.ts
scripts.deploy:experimental: VARIANT=experimental yarn setup && NAME=pods-experimental yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:mainnet-dev: VARIANT=mainnet-dev yarn setup && NAME=pods-dev yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:mainnet: VARIANT=mainnet yarn setup && NAME=pods yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:arbitrum-dev: VARIANT=arbitrum-dev yarn setup && NAME=pods-arbitrum-dev yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: VARIANT=arbitrum yarn setup && NAME=pods-arbitrum yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:kovan-dev: VARIANT=kovan-dev yarn setup && NAME=pods-kovan-dev yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:kovan: VARIANT=kovan yarn setup && NAME=pods-kovan yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:mumbai-dev: VARIANT=mumbai-dev yarn setup && NAME=pods-mumbai-dev yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:mumbai: VARIANT=mumbai yarn setup && NAME=pods-mumbai yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:matic-dev: VARIANT=matic-dev yarn setup && NAME=pods-matic-dev yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:matic: VARIANT=matic yarn setup && NAME=pods-matic yarn deploy
